body_html:
CUDA 7.5 and cuDNN 5.0. the above mentioned error no longer appears after doing what xuxy09 suggested. I would only like to make it a little easier for you with the next line:

sudo pip install six --upgrade --target="/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages"
body_text:

body:
CUDA 7.5 and cuDNN 5.0. the above mentioned error no longer appears after doing what xuxy09 suggested. I would only like to make it a little easier for you with the next line:

sudo pip install six --upgrade --target="/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages"
